  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, ciun(s0, c2, csn(cfv(c3, csn(cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, ciun(s0, c2, csn(cfv(c3, csn(cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c3))

  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  sneqd(cfv(cfv(crsp, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cfv(cfv(crsp, c0), csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(crsp, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0)), cfv(crsp, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  unex(crn(cfv(crsp, c0)), csn(emptycls))

  mprgbir(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wss(ciun(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(cfv(crsp, c0), csn(cv(s0))))), cun(crn(cfv(crsp, c0)), csn(emptycls))), wss(csn(cfv(cfv(crsp, c0), csn(cv(s0)))), cun(crn(cfv(crsp, c0)), csn(emptycls))))
  iunss(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(cfv(crsp, c0), csn(cv(s0)))), cun(crn(cfv(crsp, c0)), csn(emptycls)))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wss(csn(cfv(cfv(crsp, c0), csn(cv(s0)))), cun(crn(cfv(crsp, c0)), csn(emptycls))))
  ax-mp(wss(csn(cfv(cfv(crsp, c0), csn(cv(s0)))), cun(crn(cfv(crsp, c0)), csn(emptycls))), wcel(cfv(cfv(crsp, c0), csn(cv(s0))), cun(crn(cfv(crsp, c0)), csn(emptycls))))

  snssi(cfv(cfv(crsp, c0), csn(cv(s0))), cun(crn(cfv(crsp, c0)), csn(emptycls)))
  eqtri(ciun(s0, c2, csn(cfv(c3, csn(cv(s0))))), ciun(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(cfv(crsp, c0), csn(cv(s0))))), ciun(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c3, csn(cv(s0))))))
  ax-mp(wceq(ciun(s0, c2, csn(cfv(c3, csn(cv(s0))))), ciun(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), csn(cfv(c3, csn(cv(s0)))))), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))

thm lpival(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring → c1 = ⋃(s0 ∈ c2, {(c3 ` { s0 })}))
  ⊣ c1 =(LPIdeal ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(RSpan ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Ring → c1 = ⋃(s0 ∈ c2, {(c3 ` { s0 })})), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Ring → c1 = ⋃(s0 ∈ c2, {(c3 ` { s0 })})), d(s0, c3))
  3eqtr4g(c1, ⋃(s0 ∈ c2, {(c3 ` { s0 })}), (LPIdeal ` c0), ⋃(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })}), c0 ∈ Ring)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, crg, clpidl, ⋃(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })}), ⋃(s0 ∈(Base ` hs0), {((RSpan ` hs0)` { s0 })}))
  iuneq12d(s0, (Base ` hs0), {((RSpan ` hs0)` { s0 })}, (Base ` c0), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })}, hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  sneqd(((RSpan ` hs0)` { s0 }), ((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 }), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((RSpan ` hs0), { s0 }, (RSpan ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, crsp)
  df-lpidl(hs0, s0)
  ssexi(⋃(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })}), (ran((RSpan ` c0))⋃ { ∅ }))
  unex(ran((RSpan ` c0)), { ∅ })
  rnex((RSpan ` c0))
  fvex(crsp, c0)
  p0ex()
  mprgbir(s0, (Base ` c0), ⋃(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })})⊆(ran((RSpan ` c0))⋃ { ∅ }), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })} ⊆(ran((RSpan ` c0))⋃ { ∅ }))
  iunss(s0, (Base ` c0), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })}, (ran((RSpan ` c0))⋃ { ∅ }))
  a1i(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })} ⊆(ran((RSpan ` c0))⋃ { ∅ }))
  ax-mp({((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })} ⊆(ran((RSpan ` c0))⋃ { ∅ }), ((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })∈(ran((RSpan ` c0))⋃ { ∅ }))
  fvrn0((RSpan ` c0), { s0 })
  snssi(((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 }), (ran((RSpan ` c0))⋃ { ∅ }))
  eqtri(⋃(s0 ∈ c2, {(c3 ` { s0 })}), ⋃(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })}), ⋃(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {(c3 ` { s0 })}))
  ax-mp(⋃(s0 ∈ c2, {(c3 ` { s0 })})= ⋃(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {(c3 ` { s0 })}), c2 =(Base ` c0))
  iuneq1(s0, c2, (Base ` c0), {(c3 ` { s0 })})
  iuneq2i(s0, (Base ` c0), {(c3 ` { s0 })}, {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })})
  a1i(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {(c3 ` { s0 })} = {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })})
  sneqi((c3 ` { s0 }), ((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 }))
  fveq1i(c3, { s0 }, (RSpan ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crg)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃(s0 ∈(Base ` c0), {((RSpan ` c0)` { s0 })}))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, ran((RSpan ` c0)), { ∅ })
  diff.crn.s(s0, (RSpan ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, crsp, c0)
  diff.crsp.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)

blocks.name: islpidl
blocks.content: Property of being a principal ideal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm islpidl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c1, cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clpidl, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(crsp, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c1, cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c3, csn(cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0)))))))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, ciun(s0, c3, csn(cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, crg))
  lpival(s0, c0, c2, c3, c4)
  bitri(wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c3, csn(cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0)))))), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c1, cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, c3, wcel(c1, csn(cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0)))))))
  eliun(s0, c1, c3, csn(cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0)))))
  rexbii(s0, c3, wcel(c1, csn(cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0))))), wceq(c1, cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0)))))
  elsn2(c1, cfv(c4, csn(cv(s0))))
  fvex(c4, csn(cv(s0)))
}

thm islpidl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring →(c1 ∈ c2 ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c1 =(c4 ` { s0 }))))
  ⊣ c2 =(LPIdeal ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(RSpan ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c1 =(c4 ` { s0 })), c1 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c3, {(c4 ` { s0 })}))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, ⋃(s0 ∈ c3, {(c4 ` { s0 })}), c0 ∈ Ring)
  lpival(s0, c0, c2, c3, c4)
  bitri(c1 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c3, {(c4 ` { s0 })}), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c1 =(c4 ` { s0 })), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ {(c4 ` { s0 })}))
  eliun(s0, c1, c3, {(c4 ` { s0 })})
  rexbii(s0, c3, c1 ∈ {(c4 ` { s0 })}, c1 =(c4 ` { s0 }))
  elsn2(c1, (c4 ` { s0 }))
  fvex(c4, { s0 })
}

  islpidl(hs0, c0, csn(c1), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(crsp, c0))

blocks.name: islpir
blocks.content: Principal ideal rings are where all ideals are principal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm islpir(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, clpir), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clpidl, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clidl, c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, clpir, crg, wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(clidl, cv(hs0)), cfv(clpidl, cv(hs0))))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(clidl, cv(hs0)), cfv(clpidl, cv(hs0))), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(clidl, c0), cfv(clpidl, c0)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(clidl, cv(hs0)), cfv(clpidl, cv(hs0)), cfv(clidl, c0), cfv(clpidl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, clidl)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, clpidl)
  eqeq12i(c1, c2, cfv(clidl, c0), cfv(clpidl, c0))
  df-lpir(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crg)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c1, c2))
}

thm islpir(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ LPIR ↔(c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 = c2))
